thread.section_title: La Maison Champs Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of La Maison Champs Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: erezsiniver1
title: Great location
text:
My Son and I stayed in this boutique hotel for 3 nights. In the first day we got very small room. We were very dissapointed from the room. The next day we got much better room.
The location is great. We had a nice breakfast in the hotel. Overall it is a very nice hotel with good service, but some of his room are very small. I recommend this hotel.
Room Tip: Some rooms are very small See more room tips
